content:
The Jordaan neighborhood sounds really charming, and I'd love to explore it. I'm also interested in visiting the Van Gogh Museum and trying some stamppot. I've heard it's a classic Dutch dish.

By the way, since I've been living in Paris for three months now, I've been trying to cook my own meals to save money and eat healthy. Do you have any recommendations for affordable and easy-to-make Dutch recipes I could try while I'm in Amsterdam? Maybe something I could cook in a hostel kitchen?
